title: Who is Jarro Lightfeather? - (#3) Lore Master Quiz

embed.description: Welcome to the third lore master quiz, focusing on league of legends lore! How well will you do? Th LORE SPOTLIGHT DISCORD: https://discord.gg/ZuRqXHY AI interface voice by Sara Dunham https://sara-dunham.co.uk/ Quiz questions voiced by Noxxarian Content used: - Visual additions used, such as the background for the quiz question display, etc.

body:
I had entirely forgotten to share the next part of the quiz here! My apologies :D

Here it is! Let me know how well you do! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: fun fact, I have pitched and hope to one day write, a series of tales called "The Dashing Adventures of Jarro Lightfeather" which would chronicle Ez's exploits in Demacia, but narrated by Ez using the Jarro voice.

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=2cJEMGUI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-01T15:54:54.946+0000)
>
> fun fact, I have pitched and hope to one day write, a series of tales called "The Dashing Adventures of Jarro Lightfeather" which would chronicle Ez's exploits in Demacia, but narrated by Ez using the Jarro voice.

Can we maybe instead get Lissandra narrating the history of Runeterra, Void invasions, wars and the rise and fall of other factions? 
I bet lots of people would like to know about stuff lile that and liss is old enough to tell such stories..

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=2cJEMGUI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-01T15:54:54.946+0000)
>
> fun fact, I have pitched and hope to one day write, a series of tales called "The Dashing Adventures of Jarro Lightfeather" which would chronicle Ez's exploits in Demacia, but narrated by Ez using the Jarro voice.

If you ever do it (or any other champ like Vlad) let me know so I can audition for it :D
